item.title: Do You Need Self Discipline To Have Fun?
item.description: I can relate to this excellent post by Scott Young, where he makes the case that ease of doing an activity and its enjoyment aren’t the same. Consider:

item.title: Talking About Money
item.description: Patrick McKenzie wrote an excellent post about compensation and salary transparency. The entire post is really informative, but for me, this passage is a true gem. Every word here is absolutely true:

item.title: Why Racket? Why Lisp?
item.description: A slightly older (from Aug 2014), but nonetheless great post by Matthew Butterick where he enumerates the benefits of learning to program in Lisp (or one of its dialects).
